Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires travel consultants to furnish written travel agreements to consumers
Summary: Requires travel consultants to furnish written travel agreements to consumers; requires written and electronic disclosure of terms of such agreement at the time such agreement is entered into; increases penalties for relevant violations.
LawCode: Add ยง157-b, amd ยง159, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to travel agreements
